title: 74. How Narcissism Affected the Way I Viewed Myself
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode we talk all about my experience with narcissism growing up and how it affected the way I viewed myself and others and how it affected my dating experiences and self-esteem. Can't wait for you to tune in!

Click here to join the waitlist for my upcoming Self-love course to get $150 off! Hurry! Waitlist closes October 11, 2020!

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
